subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|of water currents}} to [[swash]]; to [[surge]]; to [[dash]]
# [[rapid]]; [[acute]]; [[fierce]]; [[strong]]
# [[drastic]]; [[radical]]; [[extreme]]
# to [[excite]]; to [[arouse]]; to [[incite]]
# [[resounding]]; [[reverberating]]; [[aroused]]
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} [[brilliant]]; [[great]]; [[cool]]
# to [[restrain]]; to [[check]]
# to [[chill]] (something by dipping it in cold water)
# to [[fall]] [[ill]] from [[getting]] [[wet]]
# [[violently]]; [[fiercely]]; [[quickly]]
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} to [[infuriate]]; to [[piss off]]
#: {{zh-l|激嚫}}
#: {{zh-l|激死}}
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
